body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support team. My name is Joe Simmons, and I represent Elite Motors, a leading car dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I kindly ask for your name so I can assist you better with your query today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Sharon Hughes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sharon. Could you please provide me with the registration number of your vehicle for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven five zero eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sharon. Additionally, could you confirm the total mileage on your odometer in words?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's three two five zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Sharon. Is there anything specific about the pricing concern that's making you feel nervous?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm worried that the quoted price might not include all the necessary fees.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Sharon. Thank you for sharing that with me. We will review the details and ensure transparency. We appreciate your patience and cooperation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you once again for reaching out, Sharon. If you have any additional questions or require further assistance, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
